title: Judgment in Death
description: In an uptown strip joint, a cop is found bludgeoned to death. The weapon is a baseball bat. The motive is a mystery. It's a case of serious overkill that pushes Eve Dallas straight into overdrive. Her investigation uncovers a private club that is more than a hot spot. Purgatory's a last chance for atonement where everyone is judged. Where your most intimate fate depends on your most intimate sins. And where one cop's hidden secrets are about to plunge innocent souls into vice-ridden damnationâ€¦
author: J.D. Robb
